Context-sensitive <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/captureanalysis">CaptureAnalysis</a> provider, which computes and caches the earliest common dominator closure of all captures. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/earliestescapeanalysis/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplecaptureanalysis">SimpleCaptureAnalysis</a></>}>
Context-free <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/captureanalysis">CaptureAnalysis</a> provider, which computes and caches whether an object is captured in the function at all, but does not distinguish whether it was captured before or after the context instruction. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplecaptureanalysis/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

## Public Member Functions

### isNotCapturedBefore() {#aa5a5f80196908b2cc81274b59bb264a4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual bool llvm::CaptureAnalysis::isNotCapturedBefore (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Object, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I, bool OrAt)</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> whether Object is not captured before instruction I.

If OrAt is true, captures by instruction I itself are also considered.

If I is nullptr, then captures at any point will be considered.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h/#l00155">155</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h">AliasAnalysis.h</a>.
